section.heading: General.
section.text: Every individual shall have an equal opportunity to participate fully in the economic, cultural and intellectual life of the District and to have an equal opportunity to participate in all aspects of life, including, but not limited to, in employment, in places of public accommodation, resort or amusement, in educational institutions, in public service, and in housing and commercial space accommodations.

annoGroup.heading: Cross References
annoGroup.annotation: Public accommodations licensed by District, prohibition against discrimination, see § 47-2901 et seq.
